name: Crypto Emporium
slogan: World's First Crypto-Only Online Retail Store
description: We work as an intermediary service. Linking buys and sellers and facilitating cryptocurrency transactions. Due to the nature of borderless cryptocurrency we're able to operate a completely worldwide website. We've processed orders from all 4 corners of the world. We want to open up our market by offering more cost effective solutions with the goal to convert non-cryptocurrency holders into customers.

jobs.title: Investor Relations
jobs.description:
Crypto Emporium is actively looking for angel investment. In order to forward our business goals and truly establish ourselves as a global brand in the cryptocurrency space, we need someone to help find, contact and onboard investors. 

We have a lot going for us in our first 18 months of trading, we're posting good profit with revenue over $200,000 in the first year. This is a business that is easily investable to the right individual/company. 

The right candidate will have experience and knowledge in how to find, contact and attract outside investment from companies. They will have excellent communication skills, they will be able to create and refine informative business plans and pitch decks and most importantly, they will believe in our cryptocurrency business.

15% of investment received will be paid as commission to candidate, as well as 1-2% equity in Crypto Emporium. 

This is a commission/equity only deal and there will be no monthly/weekly salary.

jobs.title: Lead Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Crypto Emporium is looking for a new Lead Software Engineer to front and form a team of developers to begin development of our new Peer-to-Peer Marketplace platform. 

**Information**

Crypto Emporium was set up in February 2018 and in that time we have achieved a huge amount of revenue on an incredibly limited budget and platform. The current CryptoEmporium.eu website is built on WordPress, making use of CoinPayments and operates as an intermediary service. Which means the majority of sales are manually fulfilled by ourselves. 

The goal of this project is move our website to a peer-to-peer model whereby users are able to buy and sell products using cryptocurrency. 

This is a contractual paid position whereby if a successful working relationship is formed, equity and a full-time position will be made available.

**Requirements**

As Lead Software Engineer it will be your job to help direct and form our technical vision for the project. You will be working closely with me (someone with limited technical knowledge). You will understand the requirements of the build and be able to form an effective team of developers to enact our vision. 

You will be aware of recent trends and best practices in order to see our platform at built with maximum ease and minimum cost. You will hold some interest in cryptocurrencies, but most importantly you will believe in our project and the vision. 

I will be looking to hire 3/4 development positions for you to manage and work alongside to create our vision in such a short time frame. 

**Scope**

Full details on the platform and features that need to be implemented will be shared over a phone call meeting. I have allocated 6 weeks to create version 1.0.1 of our new platform. This will allow enough time to guage any working relationship moving forward. 

Time is of the essense here, I need applicants who have completely understood the job posting, who have genuine enthusiams for the project and those who have the capability to make the time commitments. 

I look forward to reading your applications and speaking with you about this opportunity. 

Best, 

Stephen
